b:if.b:skin: /*<Group description="Header"><Variable name="fxHead" description="Fixed Header" type="length" default="2px" min="1px" max="2px" value="2px"/><Variable name="logoSize" description="Logo Size" type="length" default="80px" min="80px" max="150px" value="143px"/><Variable name="popSearch" description="Popup Search" type="length" default="2px" min="1px" max="2px" value="2px"/><Variable name="liveSearch" description="Live Search Results" type="length" default="2px" min="1px" max="2px" value="2px"/></Group><Group description="Layout"><Variable name="fxLayout" description="Fixed Layout" type="length" default="2px" min="1px" max="2px" value="2px"/><Variable name="imgRadius" description="Images Corners" type="length" default="10px" min="1px" max="100px" value="100px"/><Variable name="themeColor" description="Dark Mode Default" type="length" default="1px" min="1px" max="2px" value="2px"/><Variable name="darkMode" description="Dark Mode Switcher" type="length" default="2px" min="1px" max="2px" value="1px"/><Variable name="toTop" description="Scroll to Top Button" type="length" default="2px" min="1px" max="2px" value="2px"/></Group><Group description="Article"><Variable name="breadcrumb" description="Breadcrumb" type="length" default="2px" min="1px" max="2px" value="2px"/><Variable name="cmCount" description="Comments Counter" type="length" default="1px" min="1px" max="2px" value="2px"/><Variable name="rPosts" description="Related Posts" type="length" default="2px" min="1px" max="2px" value="2px"/></Group><Group description="Font"><Variable name="main.font" description="Site Font" type="font" family="Poppins" default="normal normal 14px $(family)" value="normal bold 14px Poppins"/></Group><Group description="Background"><Variable name="background.color" description="Body Background Color" type="color" default="#f7f8f9" value="#f7f8f9"/><Variable name="body.background" description="Body Background" type="background" color="$(background.color)" default="$(color) url(https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEjiVAdgk1o2TISssKjWv7zhq2_I09liL5mXMYdtmACebwPoeVK4ZnYJ8sxltJ_akq9lVbD_UPeN5pGFTOzKf-3UsmU9FB7FxUypR2EjSmhqTDzHelY1cU2NrUCt3q_CBNrfwAz-LMex3mqlftRQRRckk9bRidYozzQQnPOgHp039GEybjYQkhXf1hAHdw=s16000) repeat fixed top center" value="$(color) url(https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEjiVAdgk1o2TISssKjWv7zhq2_I09liL5mXMYdtmACebwPoeVK4ZnYJ8sxltJ_akq9lVbD_UPeN5pGFTOzKf-3UsmU9FB7FxUypR2EjSmhqTDzHelY1cU2NrUCt3q_CBNrfwAz-LMex3mqlftRQRRckk9bRidYozzQQnPOgHp039GEybjYQkhXf1hAHdw=s16000) repeat fixed top center"/></Group><Group description="Colors"><Variable name="main.color" description="Main Color" type="color" default="#3d55ef" value="#3d55ef"/><Variable name="child.color" description="Child Color" type="color" default="#1b2982" value="#1b2982"/><Variable name="text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#202124" value="#202124"/><Variable name="link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/><Variable name="widgetBg" description="Boxed Widgets Background Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/><Variable name="megaBg" description="Boxed Mega Menu Background Color" type="color" default="#f7f7f7" value="#f7f7f7"/><Variable name="linksBg" description="Boxed Links Background Color" type="color" default="#f5f8fa" value="#f5f8fa"/><Variable name="quotesBg" description="Boxed Quotes Background Color" type="color" default="#2a2a2a" value="#2a2a2a"/><Variable name="quotesTc" description="Boxed Quotes Text Color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/><Variable name="bquoteBg" description="Block Quote Background Color" type="color" default="#f5f8fa" value="#f5f8fa"/><Variable name="checkBg" description="Check Msg Background Color" type="color" default="#4ab33c" value="#1cbb8c"/><Variable name="infoBg" description="Info Msg Background Color" type="color" default="#1528a4" value="#1528a4"/><Variable name="exclamationBg" description="Exclamation Msg Background Color" type="color" default="#dd9d16" value="#dd9d16"/><Variable name="errorBg" description="Error Msg Background Color" type="color" default="#ef0c0c" value="#1cbb8c"/></Group><Group description="Darkmode Colors"><Variable name="Dmain.color" description="Dark Main Color" type="color" default="#136594" value="#136594"/><Variable name="Dchild.color" description="Dark Child Color" type="color" default="#6010a9" value="#1cbb8c"/><Variable name="Dbody.bg" description="Dark Body Background Color" type="color" default="#242d4a" value="#242d4a"/><Variable name="DtextColor" description="Dark Text Color" type="color" default="#e7e7e7" value="#e7e7e7"/><Variable name="DlinkColor" description="Boxed Link Dark Background Color" type="color" default="#e7e7e7" value="#e7e7e7"/><Variable name="DwidgetBg" description="Boxed Widgets Dark Background Color" type="color" default="#1d2239" value="#1d2239"/><Variable name="DmegaBg" description="Boxed Mega Menu Dark Background Color" type="color" default="#1d2239" value="#1d2239"/><Variable name="DlinksBg" description="Boxed Links Dark Main Color" type="color" default="#252f59" value="#252f59"/><Variable name="DborderC" description="Borders Dark Color" type="color" default="#1d2545" value="#1d2545"/><Variable name="DquotesBg" description="Boxed Quotes Dark Background Color" type="color" default="#24272a" value="#24272a"/><Variable name="DbquoteBg" description="Block Quote Dark Background Color" type="color" default="#1d2545" value="#1d2545"/></Group><Variable name="body.background.color" description="Comments Background" hideEditor="true" type="color" default="rgba(255,255,255,0)" value="rgba(255,255,255,0)"/><Variable name="body.title.color" description="Comments Color" hideEditor="true" type="color" default="$(main.color)" value="#136594"/><Variable name="body.text.color" description="Comments Text Color" hideEditor="true" type="color" default="$(main.color)" value="#136594"/><Variable name="body.link.color" description="Comments Link Color" hideEditor="true" type="color" default="$(main.color)" value="#136594"/><Variable name="body.text.font" description="Comments Font 1" hideEditor="true" type="font" default="normal 400 14px Arial, sans-serif !important" value="normal 400 14px Arial, sans-serif !important"/><Variable name="body.action.font.large" description="Comments Font 2" hideEditor="true" type="font" default="normal 700 14px Arial, sans-serif !important" value="normal 700 14px Arial, sans-serif !important"/>*/

b:class.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and (data:widgets none w => w.sectionId in ["allSide", "indexSide"])
b:class.name: noSide

b:class.cond: data:view.isPost and data:widgets none w => w.sectionId in ["allSide", "postSide"]
b:class.name: noSide

b:class.cond: data:view.isPage and data:widgets none w => w.sectionId == "allSide"
b:class.name: noSide

b:class.cond: data:view.isError and data:widgets none w => w.sectionId == "allSide"
b:class.name: noSide

b:if.cond: data:title not contains "[Ads]" and data:widget.sectionId not in ["mainSett","topAd-index","topAd-post","topList","mainAd-index","mainAd-post","mainMenu","layout-1","blockAd-index","blockAd-post","afterAd","beforeAd","footerDetails"]
data:widget.type in ["Label","LinkList"] and (data:title contains "isQuotes" or data:title contains "isIcons" or data:title contains "isFeatured")
data:widget.sectionId == "layout-1" and (data:content contains "slider-1" or data:content contains "grid-1")

b:elseif.cond: data:widget.sectionId in ["layout-2","layout-3"] and (data:content contains "slider-2" or data:content contains "grid-2" or data:content contains "tabs-1")

data:widget.sectionId in ["indexSide","allSide","postSide","panelContent","footerCols"] and (data:content contains "sided-1" or data:content contains "sided-2" or data:content contains "sided-3" or data:content contains "sided-4" or data:content contains "comments")

b:eval.expr: ".singlePost .postHeader.hasImage .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.grid-1 .item-1 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.tabs-1 .item-0 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.sided-2 .item-0 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.sided-4 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.FeaturedPost .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.slider-1 .slide-1 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.slider-2 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "]{background-color:" + data:link.target + "}"

".singlePost .postHeader.hasImage .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.grid-1 .item-1 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.tabs-1 .item-0 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.sided-2 .item-0 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.sided-4 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.FeaturedPost .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.slider-1 .slide-1 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.slider-2 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a{color:#fff}"

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Anne ve Çocuk,Bebek,Bebek-Çocuk,Cilt Bakımı,Dekorasyon,Diyet,Ekonomi,Güncel,Hamilelik,Hamilelikte Sağlık,Hamilelikte Yemek,Hayvanlar Alemi,Kimdir,Kişisel Gelişim,Listeler,Nedir,Otomobil,Psikoloji,Saç Bakımı,Sağlık,Sinema,Teknoloji,Yaşam,Çocuk Gelişimi,İlaçlar,İlişkiler

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["topList","topTicker"])

b:tag.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["layout-1","blockAd-index"]) or data:view.isPost and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "blockAd-post")
b:tag.name: div

b:if.cond: data:allBylineItems.author or data:allBylineItems.timestamp or data:allBylineItems.comments or data:post.labels

b:tag.cond: data:view.isPost and data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "beforeAd"
b:tag.name: div

b:tag.cond: data:view.isPost and data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "afterAd"
b:tag.name: div

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to Facebook

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to Twitter

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to Linkedin

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to Pinterest

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to Telegram

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to Reddit

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to WhatsApp

c=(d&&((d.content&&d.content.$t)||(d.summary&&d.summary.$t)))||"";if(d&&d.gd$extendedProperty){for(var b in d.gd$extendedProperty){if(d.gd$extendedProperty[b].name=="blogger.contentRemoved"){return''+c+""}}}return c};var F=function(i){y=null;var e=[];if(i&&i.feed&&i.feed.entry){for(var h=0,b;b=i.feed.entry[h];h++){var f={};var d=/blog-(\d+).post-(\d+)/.exec(b.id.$t);f.id=d?d[2]:null;f.body=B(b);f.timestamp=Date.parse(b.published.$t)+"";if(b.author&&b.author.constructor===Array){var c=b.author[0];if(c){f.author={name:(c.name?c.name.$t:undefined),profileUrl:(c.uri?c.uri.$t:undefined),avatarUrl:(c.gd$image?c.gd$image.src:undefined)}}}if(b.link){if(b.link[2]){f.link=f.permalink=b.link[2].href}if(b.link[3]){var b.gd$extendedProperty){if(b.gd$extendedProperty[j].name=="blogger.itemClass"){f.deleteclass+=" "+b.gd$extendedProperty[j].value}else{if(b.gd$extendedProperty[j].name=="blogger.displayTime"){f.displayTime=b.gd$extendedProperty[j].value}}}}e.push(f)}}return e};var I=function(c){if(L()){var d=A.feed+"?alt=json&v=2&orderby=published&reverse=false&max-results=50";if(y){d+="&published-min="+new Date(y).toISOString()}window.bloggercomments=function(e){var f=F(e);y=f.length<50?null:parseInt(f[f.length-1].timestamp)+1;c(f);window.bloggercomments=null};d+="&callback=bloggercomments";var b=document.createElement("script");b.type="text/javascript";b.src=d;document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(b)}};var L=function(){return !!y};var N=function(b,c){if("iswriter"==b){var d=!!c.author&&c.author.name==A.authorName&&c.author.profileUrl==A.authorUrl;return d?"true":""}else{if("deletelink"==b){return A.baseUri+"/delete-comment.g?blogID="+A.blogId+"&postID="+c.id}else{if("deleteclass"==b){return c.deleteclass}}}return""};var s=null;var x=null;var v=undefined;var K=function(b,c){if(s==null){s=document.getElementById("comment-editor");if(s!=null){s.height="250px";s.style.display="block";x=s.src.split("#")}}if(s&&(b!==v)){s.src="";document.getElementById(c).insertBefore(s,null);s.src=x[0]+(b?"&parentID="+b:"")+"#"+x[1];v=b}};var M=(window.location.hash||"#").substring(1);var E,z;if(/^comment-form_/.test(M)){E=M.substring("comment-form_".length)}else{if(/^c[0-9]+$/.test(M)){z=M.substring(1)}}var J={maxDepth:A.maxThreadDepth};var G={id:A.postId,data:C,loadNext:I,hasMore:L,getMeta:N,onReply:K,rendered:true,initComment:z,initReplyThread:E,config:J,messages:D};var H=function(){if(window.goog&&window.goog.comments){var b=document.getElementById("comment-holder");window.goog.comments.render(b,G)}};if(window.goog&&window.goog.comments){H()}else{window.goog=window.goog||{};window.goog.comments=window.goog.comments||{};window.goog.comments.loadQueue=window.goog.comments.loadQueue||[];window.goog.comments.loadQueue.push(H)}})();

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["indexSide","allSide","postSide"])

data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isMultipleItems and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["allSide", "indexSide"])) or (data:view.isPost and data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["allSide", "postSide"]) or (data:view.isPage and data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "allSide")
data:view.isLayoutMode or data:widgets.Image any w => w.sectionId == "footerCol"

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting:
Kadın Sağlığı, Bebek, Çocuk, Hamilelik
Konuları Hakkında Bilgi Vermeyi Hedefleyen
Bilgi Paylaşım Platformu.
